p: Welcome to the unofficial Mythbound RPG Wiki for version 0.1! This community-created resource aims to help new and existing players navigate the rich world of Mythbound.

Mythbound is a custom Tibia server that transforms the traditional Tibia gameplay into a full-fledged RPG experience. With unique systems like rifts, custom professions, gear scores, prestige levels, and much more, Mythbound offers a fresh take on the classic MMORPG formula.
This wiki is organized into several main sections:
Getting Started Your first steps into Mythbound: installation, character creation, and basic controls.
Professions Everything about gathering professions: mining, herbalism, woodcutting, and skinning.
Game Mechanics Core systems that power the game: combat, leveling, gear score, prestige, and more.
Systems Deep dives into unique Mythbound systems like Rifts, Arenas, and Crafting.
Quests Guides for the various quests available in the game.
Locations Explore the world of Mythbound: cities, dungeons, and special areas.
This wiki is maintained by the Mythbound player community. If you'd like to contribute:
Create a fork of the repository
Make your changes and submit a pull request
Wiki maintainers will review and merge your contributions

│ ├── rifts.md # Ancestral Rifts│ ├── arenas.md # Arena system│ ├── crafting.md # Crafting system│ ├── legendary-weapons.md # Legendary weapons│ └── emblems.md # Emblem system
│ ├── main-quests.md # Main storyline quests│ ├── daily-quests.md # Daily quests│ └── secret-quests.md # Secret quests
